subject: JUnit vs Regression Testing
msgSnippet: Hi I would like to clarify one thing. When a commercial tool is used to test a product,it records the results from the first test run and compares it when we
messageBody:
Hi

I would like to clarify one thing.
When a commercial tool is used to test a product,it records the
results from the first test run and compares it when we run again (
Regression Testing ).

How do we actually do this with JUnit ?

Thanks
Anand
